signUpModal.title: Welcome to AlphaPoint
signUpModal.text:
Thanks for signing up to be a member of the AlphaPoint Exchange. We look forward to your participation in the world of decentralized finance.

Check your email to verify your account!

setupModal.title: Set up your biometric login
setupModal.text:
Log in quickly and securely using your fingerprint or face authentication.

Keep in mind, anyone with biometrics stored on your device will be able to access your accounts.

reset.passwordText: To change your password, we will send you an email that will allow you to access our Reset Password feature. Click the button below to receive the email.

enabled.title: Manage Two-Factor Authentication
enabled.text:
Two-Factor Authorization (2FA) adds another layer of protection to your account by requiring an additional passcode during the logging in process.

You will need to download Google Authenticator on your smartphone as part of the process to enable 2FA.

disabled.title: Enable Two-Factor Authentication
disabled.text:
Two-Factor Authorization (2FA) adds another layer of protection to your account by requiring an additional passcode during the logging in process.

You will need to download Google Authenticator on your smartphone as part of the process to enable 2FA.

You will then need to go to the web exchange and then turn on the 2FA setting there prior to enabling on your mobile device.

manage.title: Two-Factor Authentication
manage.text: Do you want Two-Factor Authentication turned on for this device?

disable.title: Disable Two-Factor Authentication
disable.text: Do you want Two-Factor Authentication turned off for this device?

margin.heading: Margin Trading
margin.introText: Margin trading is the process by which a trader borrows money from the AlphaPoint Exchange in order to either buy or sell more assets than that trader would otherwise be able to afford.
margin.requestAccountSuccess: Your margin account has been activated successfully
margin.notAllowedHeading: You are not eligible for enabling margin.
margin.notAllowedText: You are not eligible for enabling Margin Trading. Please contact the support team if you have questions about prerequisites to enable margin.
margin.notEnoughFundsHeading: You do not have enough funds in your spot account to enable margin.
margin.notEnoughFundsText: The minimum value in any asset in your spot account converted to Base Asset must be {{value}} {{symbol}}.
margin.notEligibleAndNoFundsHeading: You are not eligible for enabling margin and you do not have enough funds in your spot account to enable margin.
margin.notEligibleAndNoFundsText:
You are not eligible for enabling Margin Trading. Please contact the support team if you have questions about prerequisites to enable margin.

Also, the minimum value in any asset in your spot account converted to Base Asset must be {{value}} {{symbol}}.
margin.accountFrozenHeading: You are not eligible for enabling Margin Trading.
margin.accountFrozenText: Please contact the support team if you have questions about prerequisites to enable margin.
margin.declineModalText:
Margin trading has not been enabled.

To start using the margin feature you must accept the Margin Terms & Conditions.
margin.errorModalText: There was an error enabling margin trading
margin.successModalText:
Margin trading has been enabled.

You can now trade with margin on the Pairs that have it enabled.
margin.termsText:
Terms & Conditions for Margin Trading
1. Introduction
These Terms & Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of the margin trading services ("Services") offered by APEX ("the Platform"). By using the Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, you must not access or use the Services.
2. Eligibility
To use the Services, you must:
Be at least 18 years old (or the legal age in your jurisdiction).
Have completed the required verification process (KYC).
Have sufficient funds in your account to meet margin requirements.
Acknowledge and understand the risks associated with margin trading.
3. Risk Disclosure
Margin trading involves a high level of risk, including the potential loss of all invested capital. By using the Platform, you acknowledge the following:
You understand that leveraging increases both potential profits and losses.
Market conditions may fluctuate rapidly, leading to substantial losses.
You are responsible for monitoring your positions and ensuring compliance with margin requirements.
APEX is not responsible for any losses incurred as a result of market movements or margin calls.
4. Account and Margin Requirements
4.1 Account Balance You must maintain sufficient funds in your account to cover the margin requirements set by the Platform. Margin requirements are subject to change based on market volatility, regulatory requirements, or Platform discretion.
4.2 Margin Calls If the value of your account falls below the required margin level, the Platform may issue a margin call, requiring you to deposit additional funds or close your positions. If you do not meet the margin call, the Platform reserves the right to liquidate your positions without further notice.
4.3 Leverage The maximum leverage available on the Platform is subject to change and may vary based on the asset class being traded. You are responsible for understanding the leverage applied to your trades.
5. Fees and Charges
The Platform may charge fees for using its Services, including, but not limited to:
Trading fees for each transaction.
Interest charges on borrowed funds used in margin trading. All fees are subject to change and will be updated on the Platform's Fee Schedule.
6. Order Execution
All orders placed through the Platform are subject to market conditions, availability of liquidity, and the Platform's execution capabilities.
The Platform does not guarantee that any order will be executed at the desired price. Slippage, partial fills, and delays may occur during periods of high market volatility.
7. Account Monitoring and Responsibility
You are responsible for: Monitoring your account balance and open positions. Ensuring that you meet all margin requirements.
Understanding the mechanics of margin trading and the risks involved.
8. Platform Rights and Obligations
8.1 Modifications to Services
The Platform reserves the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of the Services at any time without prior notice.
8.2 Account Suspension and Termination The Platform may, at its discretion, suspend or terminate your account in the event of: Violation of these Terms. Failure to meet margin requirements. Suspected fraudulent or illegal activity. Regulatory requirements.
8.3 Force Majeure The Platform shall not be held liable for delays or failure in performance resulting from acts beyond its reasonable control, including, but not limited to, market disruptions, communication failures, or regulatory changes.
9. Dispute Resolution
Any disputes arising from the use of the Platform shall be resolved through arbitration in accordance with the rules of [Arbitration Body]. The decision of the arbitrator shall be final and binding.
10. Governing Law
These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Jurisdiction], without regard to its conflict of law principles.
11. Amendments to the Terms
The Platform reserves the right to amend these Terms at any time. Any changes will be communicated to you through Email. Your continued use of the Platform after the changes take effect constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.
12. Privacy Policy
Your personal data will be processed in accordance with the Platform's [Privacy Policy]. You agree to the collection, use, and storage of your personal information as outlined in the policy.
13. Limitation of Liability
The Platform shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use the Services, including, but not limited to, loss of profits, loss of data, or system failures.
14. Indemnification
You agree to indemnify and hold APEX, its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, and agents harmless from any claims, liabilities, damages, or expenses (including legal fees) arising out of your use of the Services, violation of these Terms, or infringement of any third-party rights.
15. Contact Information
For any inquiries or issues related to these Terms or the Platform's Services, you may contact us at:
Email: support@email.com
Phone: +01 123456789
Address: APEX address
Acknowledgment
By using the Platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms & Conditions.
